strings.description: An elusive thief who appears in a tale of empires and rebels, told in a faraway world. His claim to be the best thief in the world is undisputed, provided you don't ask anyone else. No-one, though, can fault his moral fiber, as he steals only from the dastardly Empire. His infiltration of Castle Palamecia was an indubitable display of his talents, but his constant braggadocio has a tendency to wear on his companions.
strings.fusion:
I always pay my debts.
Paul, greatest thief in all the world,
will pay you back, all right!
strings.summon:
I'm Paul, greatest thief in all the world!
There's no loot I can't pilfer or pinch!

strings.evolution:
So you're a collector, too?
Do you need to me to steal you something?
strings.affinity:
That's it! I like you.
What do you say?
Come steal a fortune with me!
strings.description: An elusive thief who appears in a tale of empires and rebels, told in a faraway world. An honorable type who boasts that the Empire holds no ill-gotten treasure he cannot reappropriate, he won fame for infiltrating the nigh-impregnable Castle Palamecia. Sometimes saving, sometimes being saved by Firion and his fellow rebels, he provides them with valuable weapons and information after the liberation of his hometown of Fynn.
strings.fusion:
You want to hear about the time I snuck into Palamecia?
Sure, I used a kite to land on the roof...
Hey! Wait! What, you don't believe me!?
strings.summon: Leave the looting to Paul, the greatest thief the world has ever seen! Surely you've heard of me?
